abstract: Search-engine map sites can do more for trip planning than just calculating directions.
snippet: Search-engine map sites can do more for trip planning than just calculating directions.
lead_paragraph: Search-engine map sites, like those from Bing, Google and Yahoo, can do more for trip planning than just calculating directions. All three have a setting that shows you the current traffic conditions along the planned route to avoid jams.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Mapping Extras Worth Knowing About
